a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Deaths from tobacco smoking, by age, World
Annual number of deaths from tobacco smoking (includes direct smokers, and people exposed to secondhand
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: Around 1% of these deaths are attributable to 'smokeless tobacco'
